testcase.name: Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > should return the base prompt when no userMemory is provided
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > should return the base prompt when userMemory is empty string
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > should return the base prompt when userMemory is whitespace only
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > should append userMemory with separator when provided
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > should include sandbox-specific instructions when SANDBOX env var is set
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > should include seatbelt-specific instructions when SANDBOX env var is "sandbox-exec"
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > should include non-sandbox instructions when SANDBOX env var is not set
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > should include git instructions when in a git repo
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > should not include git instructions when not in a git repo
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > GEMINI_SYSTEM_MD environment variable > should use default prompt when GEMINI_SYSTEM_MD is "false"
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > GEMINI_SYSTEM_MD environment variable > should use default prompt when GEMINI_SYSTEM_MD is "0"
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > GEMINI_SYSTEM_MD environment variable > should throw error if GEMINI_SYSTEM_MD points to a non-existent file
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > GEMINI_SYSTEM_MD environment variable > should read from default path when GEMINI_SYSTEM_MD is "true"
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > GEMINI_SYSTEM_MD environment variable > should read from default path when GEMINI_SYSTEM_MD is "1"
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > GEMINI_SYSTEM_MD environment variable > should read from custom path when GEMINI_SYSTEM_MD provides one, preserving case
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > GEMINI_SYSTEM_MD environment variable > should expand tilde in custom path when GEMINI_SYSTEM_MD is set
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > GEMINI_WRITE_SYSTEM_MD environment variable > should not write to file when GEMINI_WRITE_SYSTEM_MD is "false"
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > GEMINI_WRITE_SYSTEM_MD environment variable > should not write to file when GEMINI_WRITE_SYSTEM_MD is "0"
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > GEMINI_WRITE_SYSTEM_MD environment variable > should write to default path when GEMINI_WRITE_SYSTEM_MD is "true"
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > GEMINI_WRITE_SYSTEM_MD environment variable > should write to default path when GEMINI_WRITE_SYSTEM_MD is "1"
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > GEMINI_WRITE_SYSTEM_MD environment variable > should write to custom path when GEMINI_WRITE_SYSTEM_MD provides one
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > GEMINI_WRITE_SYSTEM_MD environment variable > should expand tilde in custom path when GEMINI_WRITE_SYSTEM_MD is set
Core System Prompt (prompts.ts) > GEMINI_WRITE_SYSTEM_MD environment variable > should expand tilde in custom path when GEMINI_WRITE_SYSTEM_MD is just ~
URL matching with trailing slash compatibility > should match URLs with and without trailing slash
URL matching with trailing slash compatibility > should not match when URLs are different
Model-specific tool call formats > should use XML format for qwen3-coder model
Model-specific tool call formats > should use JSON format for qwen-vl model
Model-specific tool call formats > should use bracket format for generic models
Model-specific tool call formats > should use bracket format when no model is specified
Model-specific tool call formats > should preserve model-specific formats with user memory
Model-specific tool call formats > should preserve model-specific formats with sandbox environment
getCustomSystemPrompt > should handle string custom instruction without user memory
getCustomSystemPrompt > should handle string custom instruction with user memory
getCustomSystemPrompt > should handle Content object with parts array and user memory
getSubagentSystemReminder > should format single agent type correctly
getSubagentSystemReminder > should join multiple agent types with commas
getSubagentSystemReminder > should handle empty array
getPlanModeSystemReminder > should return plan mode system reminder with proper structure
getPlanModeSystemReminder > should include workflow instructions
getPlanModeSystemReminder > should be deterministic
